description: Try our easy to follow Thor Lunch recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thor Lunch Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 20g reduced fat tasty cheese, cut into squares

recipeInstructions.text: Lunch: To make chicken & couscous salad, combine couscous, chicken, carrot, tomato and parsley. Toss with lemon juice and olive oil. Serve with corn cob.

Snack 1: To make melon fruit hammers with honey ricotta, cut honeydew melon into eight 1cm cubes. Cut watermelon into two 2cm x 4cm rectangles. Thread honeydew melon onto 2 short wooden skewers. Top with a watermelon rectangle. Combine ricotta and honey in a small bowl. Serve with fruit hammers.
Snack 2: To make crackers and cheese: pack separately to prevent from going soggy and assemble at school.
